text: :wave: Hi everyone! I'm Caitlin & I manage HubSpot's Accelerator programs. We are launching a new iteration of the A<https://www.HubSpot.com/partners/app/accelerator|pp Accelerator> program for partners who are interested in solving known customer demand gaps for companies doing business globally. If you are selected for the program, we'll provide all of the support you need to get your app listed in the marketplace from concept to completion. Plus, we'll help you market the app & provide 1:1 technical support during development & Certification. Feel free to email me directly at <mailto:csiegrist@HubSpot.com|csiegrist@HubSpot.com> with questions or thoughts. Thanks! I hope we get to work together soon.
